titles.ar: كتاب الْعِتْقِ وَ التَّدْبِيرِ وَ الْكِتَابَةِ
titles.en: THE BOOK OF EMANCIPATION (LIBERATION), AND THE ARRANGEMENT, AND THE CONTRACT (OF SLAVES)

titles.ar: باب أَنَّهُ لَا يَكُونُ عِتْقٌ إِلَّا مَا أُرِيدَ بِهِ وَجْهُ اللَّهِ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ
titles.en: Chapter 2 – An emancipation does not happen except what is intended by it is the Face of Allahazwj Mighty and Majestic

titles.ar: باب أَنَّهُ لَا يَكُونُ عِتْقٌ إِلَّا مَا أُرِيدَ بِهِ وَجْهُ اللَّهِ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ
titles.en: Chapter 2 – An emancipation does not happen except what is intended by it is the Face of Allahazwj Mighty and Majestic

text: عَلِيُّ بْنُ إِبْرَاهِيمَ عَنْ أَبِيهِ عَنِ ابْنِ أَبِي عُمَيْرٍ عَنْ هِشَامِ بْنِ سَالِمٍ وَ حَمَّادٍ وَ ابْنِ أُذَيْنَةَ وَ ابْنِ بُكَيْرٍ وَ غَيْرِ وَاحِدٍ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) أَنَّهُ قَالَ لَا عِتْقَ إِلَّا مَا أُرِيدَ بِهِ وَجْهُ اللَّهِ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ .

en.hubeali: Ali Bin Ibrahim, from his father, from Ibn Abu Umeyr, from Hisham Bin Salim, and Hammad, and Ibn Azina, and Ibn Bukeyr, and someone else,
(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘There is not emancipation unless what is intended by it is the Face of Allah<sup>azwj</sup> Mighty and Majestic’.

text: مُحَمَّدُ بْنُ يَحْيَى عَنْ أَحْمَدَ بْنِ مُحَمَّدٍ عَنْ عَلِيِّ بْنِ الْحَكَمِ عَنْ عَلِيِّ بْنِ أَبِي حَمْزَةَ عَنْ أَبِي بَصِيرٍ عَنْ أَبِي عَبْدِ اللَّهِ ( عليه السلام ) قَالَ لَا عِتْقَ إِلَّا مَا طُلِبَ بِهِ وَجْهُ اللَّهِ عَزَّ وَ جَلَّ .

en.hubeali: Muhammad Bin Yahya, from Ahmad Bin Muhammad, from Ali Bin Al Hakam, from Ali Bin Abu Hamza, from Abu Baseer,
(It has been narrated) from Abu Abdullah<sup>asws</sup> having said: ‘There is no emancipation unless what is sought by it is the Face of Allah<sup>azwj</sup> Mighty and Majestic’.
